document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:

Biology. In grain storage facilities. Breeding wild populations are not confirmed. Beetles occur I–XII. Oligophagous on
Triticum
spp.,
Secale
spp.,
Oryza sativa
( Poaceae ), occasionally on other dry stored products.
